text: Kambuzia Partovi (also spelt Kambozia Partovi, ; 11 November 1955 – 24 November 2020) was an Iranian movie director and scriptwriter. He was born in Rasht, Iran. His 2007 movie Café Transit, was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film. He wrote the screenplays for other directors such as The Circle. In 2013 he acted in and co-directed Closed Curtain. Partovi died on 24 November 2020 from COVID-19 in Tehran at the age of 65.Veteran film director Kambuzia Partovi passes away at 65 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1955 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Tehran Category:Iranian screenwriters Category:Iranian movie directors
title: Kambuzia Partovi
